HTML output, specify width in code

```{r}
#| label: tbl-species-count-2
penguins |>
  count(species) |>
  gt() |> 
  tab_options(
    table.width = pct(100),
  ) |> 
  cols_width(
    species ~ pct(25),
    n ~ pct(75)
  )
```
